original: 河南偃師人。曾任益州刺史，因貪婪慘忍，導致益州民怨四起，後劉焉為益州牧，將郤儉收監治罪。之後郤儉死於馬相及趙祗的叛亂。
text: Yanshi, Henan. Once served as the governor of Yizhou, because of greed and cruelty, Yizhou people complained everywhere. Later, Liu Yan became a Yizhou pastoralist, but he was frugal and imprisoned. Later, Jian died in the rebellion of Ma Xiang and Zhao Yi.
